title: Make Rakan Melee
body:
Rakan is one of my favorite champions that Riot has recently released. However, I can't help but feel when I'm playing him that he'd work a lot better as a melee champion. 
Facts: 
-He currently has the lowest range of any ranged champion.
-The animation for his auto attack is him hitting enemies with his tail (he doesn't throw anything).
-Melee champions that enhance their auto attacks (Wukong, Illaoi, etc.) have a longer range than him.
Switching this would allow him to make better use of some of his most common items, like Knight's Vow. It would also give him the option to use Relic Shield. While Ancient Coin would probably still generate more gold, one of Rakan's strengths is lane sustain (from his Q and E) and this would help enhance that. 
Rakan usually sits around the middle of support tier lists, and I think that this change would act more as a quality of life change, and not make him overpowered. With the Quest for the Relic Shield line being removed, Riot no longer has to worry about him shield stacking.
